ygData.subject: Re: Shining Light Ball
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Rudra, wake them up when you ll be back, I won t post with them until then. Meteara left the tunnel and entered the sloping room. She used her clawed paws

OOC: Rudra, wake them up when you'll be back, I won't post with them 
until then.

Meteara left the tunnel and entered the sloping room. She used her 
clawed paws to keep from going too fast, followed closely by Horn who 
carried Firaxis on his back.

They all stopped when she planted her pincer-like tail in the ice near 
the bottom.

Meteara: Now comes the fun and dangerous part... Do not transform 
until I say so. Even if the radiations here can be recharging, the 
absence of the field can overload our circuitry.

Firaxis: What are you going to do?

Meteara: I'll create the field...

She transformed and opened her pincered left arm towards the sphere. A 
sparkling ray of electricity shot at the sphere.

Meteara: Now! Quick! And come near to me! Whatever happens, endure the 
pain!

They both executed themselves and arcs of energy started to jolt from 
her. Two massive jolts converged on the two cybertronians and started 
taking their energy at an alarming rate. They all convulsed in pain, 
but the ray soon stopped, and there was no more noise.

The two transformers fell to the ground, but Meteara managed to stay 
conscious a little longer.

Meteara: There... The sphere... is secure.

Then she blacked out.
